thread.title: R P Sweeney
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by R P Sweeney

author: R P Sweeney
title: R P Sweeney
text: This is about the fourth time over the years that I had to get new tires for a car. As usual, I compared several companies, but again found Town Fair the most reasonable. In doing internet research, I found I had several questions, so called the supplied number, and got the answers I needed and set up an appointment. When I went in, they determined what needs we had for the car, and recommended a different tire that better would work for us. They explained everything, and the price was reasonable. An hour later, I had four new tires, and alignment and was driving out with a nicer ride. Happy I went there.
